level.text: 2923.1 OAH shall notify the parties by first-class mail of proceedings.

2923.2 OAH shall mail a copy of any tenant petition, by first-class mail, tony adverse party named in the tenant petition and to the housing provideristed on the registration statement for the housing accommodation.

2923.3 A housing provider who files a petition shall provide for each tenant inhe housing accommodation one (1) copy of the petition and one (1) envelopeddressed to each tenant by name, address, and rental unit, with first classail postage prepaid. The envelope shall bear OAH’s return address unless theousing provider files a hardship petition or voluntary agreement. Thenvelopes for those petitions shall bear the return address of the Rentdministrator.

2923.4 If a housing provider files a petition for a building with ten (10) orore rental units, the housing provider shall provide a hard copy and computerile of a service list containing the name, address, and rental unit for eachenant. The computer file shall be in Microsoft Word format, arranged so thathe list may be printed onto labels measuring one (1) inch by two andive-eighth inches (2 5/8”).
